Content:
Hi, I bought a Suzuki GS 550 E and I am now realizing that I have bought a dud.
The frame, brake, wheels etc are all good, just the engine that is giving never ending problems.
My question is, has anybody here removed the engine and done an electric conversion?
Any guides or advice you can offer?
Does not have to go fast and have a range of around 80-100 miles.

Thanks
Title: Electric conversion
Author: adventure@730203
